com.hbm.devices.scan.configure

Class ConfigurationMulticastSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hbm.devices.scan.configure.ConfigurationMulticastSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MulticastSender, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public final class ConfigurationMulticastSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements MulticastSender
    This class receives String messages and sends them via multicast UDP sockets

    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConfigurationMulticastSender

        public ConfigurationMulticastSender(java.util.Collection<java.net.NetworkInterface> ifs)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a ConfigurationMulticastSender object for sending configuration messages to a device.
        Parameters:
        ifs - A Collection of NetworkInterfaces over which the multicast messages will be send if sendMessage(java.lang.String) is called.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if creating the underlying socket fails.

        Sends a multicast message over the NetworkInterfaces specified in ConfigurationMulticastSender(Collection).
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        message - The JSON string to be send.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the underlying socket send fails.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes the ConfigurationMulticastSender and releases all underlying resources. The underlying socket is closed and IGMP leave messages are send.
        Specified by:
        close in interface MulticastSender
        Specified by:
        close in interface java.io.Closeable
        Specified by:

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Specified by:

        Returns:
